Package pl.polsl.controller

Class LottoBaseController

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.controller.LottoBaseController
public class LottoBaseController extends Object
Controller for operating on main lotto database
Version:
3.0
Author:
Piotr Benio

  • Constructor Details

    • LottoBaseController

      public LottoBaseController(LottoBase model, LottoBaseView view)
      Constructor, creates default controller with model and view
      Parameters:
      model - is lotto base model
      view - is lotto base view

  • Method Details

    • printWholeDatabase

      public void printWholeDatabase()
      Method prints all lotto numbers from database

    • printLastWinningNumbers

      public void printLastWinningNumbers()
      Invokes model method to print last winning numbers

    • showFrequency

      public void showFrequency()
      Invokes main printing method, shows numbers from 1 to 40, their frequency and percents

    • newRandomWinningSetProcedure

      public void newRandomWinningSetProcedure()
      invokes model method to generate new winning numbers sets. User is being twice asked how many winning sets should be generated.

    • getDataFromDatabase

      public void getDataFromDatabase() throws FileNotFoundException, InputMismatchException
      method invokes database reading procedures. If parameter exception will occure, Database can be filled randomly after user's permission.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - will be thrown when file can't be found
      InputMismatchException

    • setFilenameFromArguments

      public void setFilenameFromArguments(String[] args)
      Sets filename
      Parameters:
      args - takes filename directly from application arguments

    • askUserForFilename

      public void askUserForFilename()
      Asks user for database file name. After getting one, it will be set as filename and later used during file opening in other method
